snippet: The movie, about a virus that turns its victims into zombies, was directed by Henry Hobson.
abstract: Manohla Dargis reviews movie Maggie, directed by Henry Hobson and starring Arnold Schwarzenegger and Abigail Breslin.
lead_paragraph: The movie, about a virus that turns its victims into zombies, was directed by Henry Hobson.

headline.main: Review: In ‘Maggie,’ Arnold Schwarzenegger Faces Zombies
headline.print_headline: Review: In ‘Maggie,’ Arnold Schwarzenegger Faces Zombies
